name: CART CRASHERS (LUDUM DARE 51)
description:
WELCOME TO HËLL!

"definitive proof that bhopping makes everything fun" - scout, 2022

Enjoy the authentic CART ATTENDANT experience working for SWEDISH FURNITURE RETAILER !

Based on the employment history of one of the developers :)

CONTROLS:

WASD - MOVEMENT

SPACEBAR - JUMP

F - INTERACT

R - RESTART LEVEL

Tip: Take a SMOKE in the BREAK ROOM to reduce your STRESS! Tip: Try BUNNYHOPPING for MAXIMUM SPEED!

Game is still pretty buggy, and has a few features missing that weren’t working properly before the LD jam deadline. Removed them for the time being, but will add em’ back when I have time.

Entry for LUDUM DARE 51 by DEAN DEBONO & CHARLIE TIPPING !
